channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- PowerPress Podcasting plugin by Blubrry
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- PowerPress Podcasting plugin by Blubrry

item.title: CVE-2023-4820|2023-10-16T19:39:21.880Z -- unknown -- powerpress%20podcasting%20plugin%20by%20blubrry
item.description: The PowerPress Podcasting plugin by Blubrry WordPress plugin before 11.0.12 does not sanitize and escape the media url field in posts, which could allow users with privileges as low as contributor to inject arbitrary web scripts that could target a site admin or superadmin.
